meanings.definition: A marker used to emphasize or draw attention to specific information in a text.
meanings.sent1: I used highlighters to mark the important parts of the book.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pack of highlighters for her study notes.
meanings.sent3: The highlighters decided to have a competition to see who could glow the brightest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a set of highlighters, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The highlighters in his hand glowed like tiny beacons in the dark room.

meanings.definition: A bright or fluorescent color used to mark or emphasize something.
meanings.sent1: The artist used vibrant highlighters to make the painting pop.
meanings.sent2: The highlighters on the shelf caught her eye with their neon colors.
meanings.sent3: The highlighters at the party were the life of the event, shining in every corner.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright as a set of highlighters, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The highlighters in the box looked like a rainbow waiting to burst out.
